text:
Hi Jose! :wave:
Have you tried this API? <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/cms/source-code>

Also you might want to use this API endpoint to fetch the folder content
*`<https://api.hubapi.com/content/filemapper/v1/download/{FOLDER}?hapikey={KEY}>`*

or this
*`<https://api.hubapi.com/cms/v3/source-code/published/metadata/{>_FOLDER_}?hapikey={_KEY_}`*

I have problems fetching *deals* using the API, getting a zero result set. Other API calls work,
for example <https://api.hubapi.com/engagements/v1/engagements/paged?hapikey=MYKEY> .

Perhaps I'm missing something simple?

<https://api.hubapi.com/deals/v1/deal/paged?hapikey=MYKEY>

Getting:
```{"deals":[],"hasMore":false,"offset":0}```

Hi there, hope this is in the right place.
I have to deal with custom object and request data from each items stored in the custom object.
I can't find any endpoint for getting data from an object, there is someone else who has any clue about that ?
I'll leave more information in this conversation.
Thanks for your help.

We created the custom object "coupon"
which is defined with two fields (2 strings).
This custom object can be associate with contact, deals an company.
I have to verify if someone (a contact) with a specific contact field collected with a form in our website use a valid "coupon". For that I have to get the "coupon" in the contact properties and find inside all my "coupon" and find a match if there is one.

i can't find any endpoint to do that.

that should work assuming you have deals :laughing:...
Have you tried the v3 version?

Hi all :D

For one of our clients we're syncing their user database with HubSpot, this is done every night. But we have an issue a user changes their email.

This is the scenario:
1. An already existing customer wants to change their email adress in our system, this user have been previously added to HubSpot
2. Upon inputting their new email adress in our system, we send a single-send API transactional email right away asking the user to verify the email adress. As we don't want to add unverified emails to HubSpot.
3. HubSpot sees that we send an email to what it thinks is a new account and creates a new contact with the associated email adress. This contact is now a duplicate as it is not associated with the original contact

How do we solve this? So that the new email is connected with the existing contact?

Also tried:
<https://api.hubapi.com/crm/v3/objects/deals?hapikey=MYKEY>

```{"results":[]}```
Mind sending me a portal id?
You can get all the contact ids related to that deal using deals apis and then can use those contact ids to get the contact. Hope it helps

How do I get the portal id ?

In the dashboard I can   see deals using this kind of link:
<https://app.HubSpot.com/contacts/SOME-NUMBER/objects/0-3/views/all/list>
where SOME-NUMBER is some actual number
you can dm if you want
an app link to the portal is fine as well

Hi,
I'm building a custom app, got a subscription for specific property change.
when changing the property its triggering the webhook more the once. any idea why?
thanks, turns out I can get data from our <https://fivetran.com/docs/applications/HubSpot> connector, so going with that for now

Greetings Everyone. HubSpot support chat recommended I ask the community here for my question. My question… Does HubSpot have any API capabilities that allow vendors to send leads directly through an API?
Hey <@U02QDSJQNC8>! Are you looking for an integration partner?

Hi!
I might help if you tell me more about it. You can ping me direct

Greetings Everyone, I have several question about HubSpot API :
1. Is there any way to search contacts & also associate it with deals in v3?
2. Is there any way to associate deals with contacts using search API in v3?
3. For deals API, is there any way for me to search contact from deals when associate it?
